00035    struct convTable_entry {
00037       const uint32 unicodeChar;
00039       const char* const utf8String;
00041       const int utf8Length;
00042    };
00043 
00048    struct convTable {
00049       uint32 nbrEntries;
00050       const convTable_entry* const entries;
00051    };
00052 
00053    class ConvEntryComp {
00054      public:
00055       bool operator()(const convTable_entry& a, const convTable_entry& b) {
00056          return a.unicodeChar < b.unicodeChar;
00057       }
00058       bool operator()(const convTable_entry& a, uint32 code ) {
00059          return a.unicodeChar < code;
00060       }
00061    };
00062 
00064    struct convTableFindRes {
00065       convTableFindRes( const char* aStr, int aLen ) : resString(aStr),
00066                                                        resStringLength(aLen) {}
00067       const char* resString;
00068       int resStringLength;
00069    };
00070 
00078    static convTableFindRes findInTable( const convTable& table,
00079                                         uint32 code ) {
00080       const convTable_entry* begin = table.entries;
00081       const convTable_entry* end   = table.entries + table.nbrEntries;
00082       const convTable_entry* found = std::lower_bound( begin, end,
00083                                                        code,
00084                                                        ConvEntryComp() );
00085       if ( found->unicodeChar == code ) {
00086          return convTableFindRes(found->utf8String,
00087                                  found->utf8Length );
00088       } else {
00089          return convTableFindRes(NULL, 0);
00090       }
00091    }
00092    
00093 
00094    /*
00095     *  Table to convert from upper to lower case. If a character does not
00096     *  exist in the table, it should be kept as is
00097     */
00098    static convTable c_lowerTable;
00099    /*
00100     *  Table to convert from lower to uppercase. If a character does not
00101     *  exist in the table, it should be kept as is.
00102     */

00104    /*
00105     *  Table remove strange characters and convert accented characters to
00106     *  non-accented ones. For use in the SM. If a character does not exist
00107     *  in the table, it should be removed. If a space is returned, the
00108     *  character corresponds to a space.
00109     */
00110    static convTable c_removeStrange;
